title: Lowest electricity production from oil sources
description: In 2022, only 0.002% of Paraguay's electricity was produced from oil sources, one of the lowest percentages globally.

title: Lowest CO2 emissions from waste
description: Paraguay's CO2 emissions from waste were just 0.0001 Mt CO2e in 2023, making it one of the countries with the lowest emissions in this category.

title: High merchandise exports to Latin America & the Caribbean
description: In 2023, 66.04% of Paraguay's merchandise exports were directed to low- and middle-income economies in Latin America & the Caribbean, indicating strong regional trade ties.
